Title: Carry forward the revolutionary cause and forge ahead into the future
Notes: This poster was donated in 1986 to the civil administration of Tianjin. it shows an imaginary gathering of state and party leaders and 'role models'. Among the persons identified: Hu Yaobang (on the sofa), Deng Xiaoping (on the sofa), Zhao Ziyang (standing towards the right, wearing glasses), Chen Yun, Li Xiannian, Zhang Haidi. In the background, flowers are presented to Mao's bust.
